content:
That's the right attitude! I'm thrilled to hear that you're excited to explore the IPMS website and find a local chapter near you. Meeting other modelers and learning from their experiences can be incredibly rewarding and motivating. And who knows, you might just discover a new passion or talent for competitive modeling!

Remember, the IPMS community is all about sharing knowledge, supporting each other, and having fun. Don't be shy to reach out to local chapter members, ask questions, and show off your models. You might be surprised at how much you can learn from others and how much you can grow as a modeler.

And hey, entering a contest or two can be a great way to challenge yourself and push your skills to the next level. Even if you don't win, you'll still get valuable feedback from experienced judges and a chance to see your models alongside others.

Keep me posted on your progress, and I hope you have a blast exploring the world of IPMS and competitive modeling!
